title: Leon Thomas, GELO, Ravyn Lenae & More Tear the Roof Off New York’s Webster Hall During Billboard’s R&B/Hip-Hop Concert
summary: The Sept. 5 show was one of many events held during Billboard’s R&B/Hip-Hop Week.
body: When word got out that the Billboard R&B/Hip-Hop Power Players event would be taking over Webster Hall for a free concert on Friday (Sept. 5), New Yorkers from all walks of life consumed three blocks waiting — and hoping — to get inside. Those lucky enough to gain entry celebrated every second of the night, as DJ Ohso meticulously spun through hip-hop bangers, sultry afro tunes and a little bit of Paramore to keep the crowd energized, engaged and hungry for a showcase from Billboard ‘s Rookies of the Year. Related Leon Thomas Accepts Breakthrough of Year Award at Billboard’s 2025 R&B/Hip-Hop Power Players: ‘God Is Good All the Time’ Cardi B, Leon Thomas & More Honored at Billboard R&B/Hip-Hop Power Players 2025: Best Photos Anthony ‘Top Dawg’ Tiffith Accepts Executive of the Year at Billboard’s 2025 R&B/Hip-Hop Power Players: ‘Feel Like I Should’ve Won This 3, 4, 5 Times’ Armanii kicked the night off with his signature blend of dancehall and hip-hop grooves, as fans swayed to “8:00 PM,” “JUMP (Bounce)” and others. Attendee’s workday blues than completely vanished …

title: ‘Soda Pop’ Choreographer Lee Jung Says She’s Ready to Move From Saja Boys to BTS After Success of ‘KPop Demon Hunters’
summary: THE BLACK LABEL choreographer also created the moves for HUNTR/X's "How It's Done" in the hit Netflix film.
body: KPop Demon Hunters has shattered records once again. After becoming the most-watched film in Netflix history, standout track “Golden” went on to top the Billboard Hot 100 chart (for three weeks so far). As a film centered around K-pop, this is more than just a box-office milestone; it’s a landmark in the history of the genre itself. Related ‘Golden’ Choreographer Jo Na-In ‘Stunned & Thrilled’ That ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Song Topped Hot 100, Wants to Work With Lady Gaga Next Dua Lipa Covers Aretha Franklin in Liberating Short Film for YSL's Libre Eau de Parfum: Shop the Fragrance Kansas City Chiefs vs. Los Angeles Chargers: How to Watch NFL Game in Brazil Online for Free So why has this film resonated so strongly? This can be understood in the same context as K-pop’s global popularity. Throughout its evolution, K-pop has consistently maintained a balance between music, performance and choreography. Performance videos have become almost mandatory alongside K-pop music videos, and every comeback promotion is accompanied by a dance challenge. K-pop is never just the music — it is the music with performance. In the same way, K…
